title: ‘Never felt this way in my life,’ says Halifax woman who recovered from COVID-19 - Global News
description: ‘Never felt this way in my life,’ says Halifax woman who recovered from COVID-19 Global News 'This does make me nervous': N.S. reports biggest one-day spike of COVID-19 cases CTV News ‘Irresponsible and blatantly false’: N.S. premier calls out April Fool’s Da…
content: Emily Dwyer says fighting COVID was unlike anything shes ever experienced The year old from Halifax was one of the first in the province to test positive for the virus which she contracted on an international trip Now she s one of in Nova Scotia chars
